name: GUTTERBRAWLERS
description:
A fast-paced 2D fighting game with a colorful, retro feel. Inspired by the classic Kombat-style of games that use the digital pad: 5 buttons (two for punches, two for kicks and one for blocking) and a basic move set for all characters with up to 4 unique special moves each.

Features:
  • Online mode: fight other players with insta rematches (with rollback netcode)
  • Arcade mode: face the AI for warmups or just for fun
  • Versus mode: local 2P matches
  • Training mode: viewable hitboxes and dummy recording
  • 6 characters/stages
  • FM synth soundtrack and sound effects
  • Timeless pixel art
